findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Unrestricted external borrowing against shared collateral (unauthorized debt / collateral loss via external liquidation)
findings.reasoning: This is a valid vulnerability, but it is not the target vulnerability specified in the ground truth. It is a different issue related to borrowing without proper collateral checks.

findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Repay function does not repay external debt (free accounting repayment / hides real debt)
findings.reasoning: This is a valid vulnerability, but it is not the target vulnerability specified in the ground truth. It is a different issue related to the repay function not repaying external debt.

findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Liquidation corrupts global debt accounting (orphaned debt shares / permanent bad debt)
findings.reasoning: This is a valid vulnerability, but it is not the target vulnerability specified in the ground truth. It is a different issue related to liquidation corrupting global debt accounting.

notes: None of the findings match the target vulnerability specified in the ground truth. The target vulnerability is related to the debt share calculation in the _borrow function, which was not identified in any of the findings.
